name: Arena (itch) (Purski)
description:
The desert is your playground! You are a postman but your ride is not bike, not car but hoverboard. Your mission is to find the packages that falls into the desert, and deliver them to the right villages. The faster you transport, the more money you get! However, you are not all alone in there... You are being chased by a desert worm! Surf around the desert with style and deliver as many packages as possible before the worm gets you.

There is no end goal in the game (Endless gameplay loop) :)

Keyboard:
W & S = Dive & Drift
A & D = Slide acceleration
Space = Jump

Xbox controller:
B = Dive
A = Drift
L Stick Left & Right = Slide Acceleration
X = Jump

My First Game Jam: Winter 2022 submission.
The game was developed in ten days by 6-member team.
